des: "A straightforward, moderately-hot dry rub that's fairly easy to make - just a couple of tablespoons of each ingredient for the most part.  My family loves it - one of my sons likes to put it on his fingers and lick it - so it's 'finger-lickin'-good.'"
ins: Combine salt, garlic, black pepper, cayenne pepper, paprika, chili powder, white sugar, brown sugar, and mustard in a sealable container. Seal the container and shake until spices are well-mixed.
